LanguageData.MinchoFallout.label: mincho fallout
LanguageData.MinchoFallout.description: Mincho fallout caused by Mincho fallout beacon is slowly settling over this entire region. Any living thing not under a roof, except for plants, will be slowly mutated.
LanguageData.MinchoFallout.descriptionFuture: a cloud of Mincho fallout will blanket the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], mutating outdoor animal.
LanguageData.MinchoFallout.endMessage: The worst of the Mincho fallout has settled.
LanguageData.MinchoFallout.letterText:
Because of Mincho fallout caused by Mincho fallout beacon, released mutated mechanites over this entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will be slowly infected by mutated mechanites settling out of the atmosphere.

It continues as long as it does not destroy the Mincho fallout beacon.
